ENGLISH: Hunt for the Ring
Send out your best scouts to look for the One Ring.
Craft an Item
You are a craftsman, and can use your talents to create new objects.
FRENCH: Vous êtes un artisan, et vous devriez peut-être utiliser vos talents en créant plus d'objets.

ENGLISH: Show me the Rings Holders
Show me the Rings Holders
Open the Archives of Gondor
The Archives of Gondor will show you information about the most important characters in the Kingdom.
FRENCH: Les Archives du Gondor vous donneront de nombreuses informations au sujet des personnalités les plus influentes du Royaume du Sud.

ENGLISH: Found a Holding in the Mountains
FRENCH: Créer une Nouvelle Cité dans les Montagnes

ENGLISH: You are the Lord of an unpopulated mountain range. You can send miners to create new galleries and begin to found a powerful new city or fortress for your people.
FRENCH: Vous êtes le Seigneur d'une étendue montagneuse désertique. Vous devriez y envoyer des mineurs, pour créer de nouvelles galeries, et y fonder une puissante cité ou forteresse pour votre peuple.

ENGLISH: Reunite the Council of Gondor
The Council of Gondor was composed of Captains and Princes of Gondor that provided advice to the Kings and, later, to the Stewards.
FRENCH: Le Conseil du Gondor, qui était composé des Capitaines et des Princes du Gondor, fournit des conseils aux Rois et plus tard aux Intendants du Gondor.

ENGLISH: Show the Holders of Artefacts
FRENCH: Voir les Listes des Propriétaires d'Artefacts

ENGLISH: Show lists of the holders of unique weapons, rings and palantíri.
FRENCH: Voir les Listes des Propriétaires d'Artefacts

ENGLISH: Use the Palantír
You are the guardian of one of the Palantíri, the stones of Vision brought to Middle-Earth by Elendil of Númenor. You can use it in times of war.
FRENCH: Vous êtes le Gardien de l'un des Palantiri, l'une des pierres de Vision apportées de Numenor par Elendil. Vous devriez l'utiliser en ces temps de Guerre.

ENGLISH: List the living Guardians of the Palantíri.
FRENCH: Permet de savoir qui sont les Gardiens vivants des Palantiri.

ENGLISH: Show the Guardians of the Palantíri
Visit the Palantír of Elostirion
FRENCH: Se rendre auprès du Palantir d'Elostirion

ENGLISH: Journey to the Palantír of Elostirion, the Elf Tower, and try to glimpse the Undying Lands.
FRENCH: Se rendre auprès du Palantir d'Elostirion

ENGLISH: Look into the Palantír
Look into the Palantír, the Seeing Stone, and see your future, the world and the destiny that is waiting for you.
Look into the Palantír once more
FRENCH: Besoin de regarder dans le Palantír…

ENGLISH: Look into the Palantír again, but be careful...
Look into the Palantír again...
Look into the Palantír again, but be careful...
Hide the Palantír
Hide the Palantír in a secret place and never look at it again.
FRENCH: Vous devriez enfermer le Palantír dans un coffre et ne plus jamais le regarder.

ENGLISH: Give [Root.GetFirstName] the Ithil-Stone.
Give [Root.GetFirstName] the Amon Sûl-Stone.
FRENCH: Donner la Pierre d'Amon Sûl à [Root.GetFirstName].

ENGLISH: Give [Root.GetFirstName] the Elendil-Stone.
Give [Root.GetFirstName] the Anor-Stone.
Give [Root.GetFirstName] the Orthanc-Stone.
Give [Root.GetFirstName] the Osgiliath-Stone.
Give [Root.GetFirstName] the Annúminas-Stone.
Yield the Ithil-Stone to [Root.GetFirstName], who will protect her, as you did it yourself.
FRENCH: Cédez la Pierre d'Ithil à [Root.GetFirstName], qui se chargera de la protéger, comme vous l'avez fait vous-même.

ENGLISH: Yield the Amon Sûl-Stone to [Root.GetFirstName], who will protect her, as you did it yourself.
FRENCH: Cédez la Pierre d'Amon Sûl à [Root.GetFirstName], qui se chargera de la protéger, comme vous l'avez fait vous-même.

ENGLISH: Yield the Elendil-Stone to [Root.GetFirstName], who will protect her, as you did it yourself.
FRENCH: Cédez la Pierre d'Elendil à [Root.GetFirstName], qui se chargera de la protéger, comme vous l'avez fait vous-même.

ENGLISH: Yield the Anor-Stone to [Root.GetFirstName], who will protect her, as you did it yourself.
FRENCH: Cédez la Pierre d'Anor à [Root.GetFirstName], qui se chargera de la protéger, comme vous l'avez fait vous-même.

ENGLISH: Yield the Orthanc-Stone to [Root.GetFirstName], who will protect her, as you did it yourself.
FRENCH: Cédez la Pierre d'Orthanc à [Root.GetFirstName], qui se chargera de la protéger, comme vous l'avez fait vous-même.

ENGLISH: Yield the Osgiliath-Stone to [Root.GetFirstName], who will protect her, as you did it yourself.
FRENCH: Cédez la Pierre dOsgiliath à [Root.GetFirstName], qui se chargera de la protéger, comme vous l'avez fait vous-même.

ENGLISH: Yield the Annúminas-Stone to [Root.GetFirstName], who will protect her, as you did it yourself.
FRENCH: Cédez la Pierre d'Annúminas à [Root.GetFirstName], qui se chargera de la protéger, comme vous l'avez fait vous-même.

ENGLISH: Command Servants
Command any rulers you have influence over to go to war.
FRENCH: Command any rulers you have influence over to war.

ENGLISH: Command Nazgûl
Command the Nazgûl to do your bidding.
FRENCH: Command the Nazgûl to do your bidding.

ENGLISH: Assemble the Seven Kingdoms
FRENCH: Inviter les Rois des Nains à une Assemblée

ENGLISH: Call all Dwarven Kings to a Council Assembly in Erebor.
FRENCH: Inviter les Rois des Nains à une Assemblée

ENGLISH: Mine or Craft in Erebor
FRENCH: Miner ou Fabriquer des objets en Erebor

ENGLISH: Mine for materials or craft an item.
FRENCH: Miner ou Fabriquer des objets en Erebor

ENGLISH: Send Red Arrow to Rohan
Gondor's need is great, war and death are at our doors. Shall we send the Red Arrow, and call for Rohan to honour the old alliance?
You must not have called upon recently.
Rohan must be free of the threat of Saruman.
Rohan must not already be a defender in your wars.
Send Red Arrow to Gondor
Rohan's need is great, war and death are at our doors. Shall we send the Red Arrow, and call for Gondor to honour the old alliance?
Gondor must not be under attack by Sauron.
Gondor must not already be a defender in your wars.
Claim the shards of Narsil
Only the true king of Arnor can reclaim the sword of Elendil !
FRENCH: Seul le vrai roi de l'Arnor peut réclamer l'épée d'Elendil.

ENGLISH: Victory against Angmar!
Claim victory against the Witch King of Angmar!
FRENCH: Déclarer la victoire contre le Roi Soricer d'Angmar !

ENGLISH: Reforge Narsil
Only an heroic king, acknowledged by all, will dare to reforge the sword of Elendil.
FRENCH: Seul un Roi émérite et reconnu par tous pourra prétendre à reforger l'épée d'Elendil.

ENGLISH: Rebuild Tharbad
Rebuild Tharbad
@FIXME@ Convert to City
@FIXME@ Convert to City
@FIXME@ Receive Gundabad
@FIXME@ Receive Gundabad
Claim Reunited Kingdom
Claim the Reunited Kingdom of Arnor and Gondor.
Subjugate New Land
You can invade new lands to expand your realm.
Vassalize the Shire
Send the Hobbits of the Shire the option to be peacefully vassalised under the Kingdom of Arnor, as it was in past times.
Create Orc
Create a new orc to add to your court.
Cleanse the barrows
Reports have been coming in again from wights haunting the barrows. Time to end this evil once and for all.
